name: Drug
attribute: Drug type of drug D-penicillamine or placebo

name: Ascites
attribute: Ascites presence of ascites N (No) or Y (Yes)

name: Hepatomegaly
attribute: Hepatomegaly presence of hepatomegaly N (No) or Y (Yes)

name: Spiders
attribute: Spiders presence of spiders N (No) or Y (Yes)

name: Edema
attribute: Edema presence of edema N (no edema and no diuretic therapy for edema), S (edema present without diuretics, or edema resolved by diuretics), or Y (edema despite diuretic therapy)

name: Stage
attribute: Stage histologic stage of disease (1, 2, 3, or 4)
